definition: the day after tomorrow/acquired (not innate)/a posteriori
three days from now/day after day after tomorrow
The first concern is affairs of state, enjoying the pleasure comes later. Quotation from essay On Yueyang Tower 岳陽樓記|岳阳楼记 by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4 yan1]
pinyin: xian1 tian1 xia4 zhi1 you1 er2 you1 , hou4 tian1 xia4 zhi1 le4 er2 le4
containing_words.word: 先天下之憂而憂，後天下之樂而樂

sentences.english: The homologous figures to postnatal Eight Trigrams can solve the contradiction .
sentences.chinese: 後天八卦的對應數字，就解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: Won't dot of posteriority heart disease get?
sentences.chinese: 後天性心臟病小孩子不會得的吧？

sentences.english: May I ask you to postpone the meeting until the day after tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 人大。可能要求你將會面技術延到後天嗎？

sentences.english: The departure date of your group is the day after tomorrow, you want to check out early?
sentences.chinese: 您整團的離店時間是後天，您是要提前離店嗎？

sentences.english: The two actresses were chatting away in the greenroom .
sentences.chinese: 兩個女演員在後天聊天。

sentences.english: The day after, I'll carpool to save money.
I will  call on you  the day after tommorow.
Looking better for tomorrow and Saturday, hopefully getting up to chest- to shoulder-high.
sentences.chinese: 但是明天和後天看上去不錯，希望長大到胸高到肩高。

sentences.english: All your other fears were acquired.
sentences.chinese: 其它的恐懼是後天習得的。

sentences.english: Published in 1990, acquired immune deficiency syndrome prevention and control regulations.
sentences.chinese: 於1990年公佈後天免疫缺乏綜合症防治條例。

sentences.english: We'll go to Forbidden City today, the Great Wall tomorrow, and Beihai Park the day after.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天去故宮，明天去長城，後天到北海公園。

sentences.english: Acquired shall not old, why envy Pang.
sentences.chinese: 後天應不老，何必羨彭年。

sentences.english: Poets are born, but orators are made.
sentences.chinese: 詩人是天生的，演說家則是後天練就的。

sentences.english: Self-directed learning is a natural and effective learning mode for children while guided learning is formed with the instruction of the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 導引性學習是幼兒在教師引導下後天形成的學習方式。

sentences.english: The day after tomorrow is father's seventieth birthday.
sentences.chinese: 後天是父親的七十歲生日。

sentences.english: Yesterday we decided that we should go to machine shop to repair the kelly spinner the day after tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我們決定後天去機廠修理方鑽桿旋扣器。

definition: to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to set off/to start (on a journey)
